name: Isaiah House
description: Kentucky's largest community-focused nonprofit addiction treatment organization offering Christ-centered addiction recovery programs across the state. Provides comprehensive substance abuse treatment including residential, intensive outpatient (IOP), and outpatient (OP) programs. Services include detox, medication-assisted treatment, counseling, education, workforce development, and recovery housing. Serves individuals struggling with substance use disorders with a holistic approach addressing physical, spiritual, educational, and occupational needs.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
eligibility_requirements: Individuals struggling with substance use disorders. Programs available for both men and women. Insurance accepted, sliding scale available for those without insurance.
populations_served: Adults with substance use disorders, both men and women. Serves communities across Kentucky with multiple locations throughout the state.
cost_information: Accepts insurance. Sliding scale available for those without insurance. Contact for specific pricing and payment options.
